[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: ShellExec {
            parts: [
                Literal(
                    "Hello, ",
                ),
                Expression(
                    Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span {
                                    line: 3,
                                    column: 10,
                                    position: 16,
                                },
                                name: "$name",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                ),
            ],
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 17,
                position: 23,
            },
        ),
    },
]
